titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow elective payment of applicable credits to bona fide residents of and entities organized under the laws of Puerto Rico.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow elective payment of applicable credits to bona fide residents of and entities organized under the laws of Puerto Rico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill allows elective payments of specified tax credits to bona fide residents of and entities organized under the laws of the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.
